Leoric.name: Skeletal Swing
Leoric.description: Leoric swings his mace, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 40% for 2.5 seconds. If an enemy Hero is hit, refund 50% of the cooldown and Mana cost. Peasants!

Leoric.name: Drain Hope
Leoric.description: Grab an enemy Hero's soul, dealing up to 20% of their maximum Health as damage and healing Leoric for up to 20% of his maximum Health while he is nearby, over 4 seconds. Leoric is Slowed by 20% while this is active.

Leoric.name: Wraith Walk
Leoric.description: Separate from your body, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed accelerating up to 50% over 2.5 seconds. When Wraith Walk ends or is canceled, your body jumps to your wraith.

Leoric.name: Entomb
Leoric.description: Create an unpathable tomb in front of you for 4 seconds.

Leoric.name: March of the Black King
Leoric.description: Become Unstoppable and swing your mace three times, healing yourself for 12% of your maximum Health for each enemy Hero hit and dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage.

Leoric.name: Undying
Leoric.description: Leoric becomes a ghost when he dies, and resurrects upon reaching full Health. Leoric deals no damage while dead. Wrath Of The Bone King: Leoric's first two Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage, and his third Basic Attack deals 200% damage to a single target.

LeoricUndying.name: Drain Essence
LeoricUndying.description: Throw out a chain, attaching to the first enemy Hero hit, healing Leoric for up to 10% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds as long as the enemy remains close.

1.name: Consume Vitality
1.description: Skeletal Swing's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit heal Leoric for 4% of his maximum Health.

1.name: Fealty Unto Death
1.description: When a nearby Minion dies, you restore 1% of your maximum Health and 5 Mana. Half as effective while Undying.

1.name: Ossein Renewal
1.description: Activate to heal Leoric for 30% of his maximum Health over 5 seconds. Regeneration Globes lower the cooldown of this Ability by 20 seconds.

4.name: Ghastly Reach
4.description: Increases the range of Skeletal Swing by 25%.

4.name: Kneel, Peasants!
4.description: Skeletal Swing deals 75% more damage to Minions and Mercenaries.

4.name: Paralyzing Rage
4.description: Increases the Movement Speed slow of Skeletal Swing to 60%.

7.name: Drain Momentum
7.description: Drain Hope no longer Slows Leoric. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, gain 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

7.name: Hopelessness
7.description: Increases the range of Drain Hope by 25%.

7.name: Willing Vessel
7.description: Increase the healing from Drain Hope to 25% of Leoric's maximum Health. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, Leoric instantly heals for an additional 5% of his maximum Health.

10.name: Entomb
10.description: Create an unpathable tomb in front of you for 4 seconds.

10.name: March of the Black King
10.description: Become Unstoppable and swing your mace three times, healing yourself for 12% of your maximum Health for each enemy Hero hit and dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage.

13.name: Hardened Bones
13.description: Gain 20 Armor while Drain Hope is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, retain the Armor bonus for 3 seconds.

13.name: Ominous Wraith
13.description: Increase Wraith Walk's duration by 100%. Enemy Heroes that come in contact with the wraith deal 50% less damage for 4 seconds.

13.name: Unyielding Despair
13.description: Drain Hope's cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds for every 1 second it is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, its cooldown is reduced by an additional 3 seconds.

16.name: Crushing Hope
16.description: If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, it instantly deals an additional 15% of the target's maximum Health as damage. This damage does not heal Leoric.

16.name: Mithril Mace
16.description: Increase Leoric's Attack Speed by 20%. Repeatable Quest: Nearby enemy Minion deaths grant 0.3% permanent Attack Speed, and Takedowns grant 3% permanent Attack Speed, up to 30%.

16.name: Royal Focus
16.description: Wraith Walk increases the damage of the next Skeletal Swing within 5 seconds by 50%. Each enemy Hero hit by this Skeletal Swing reduces the cooldown of Wraith Walk by 7 seconds.

20.name: Buried Alive
20.description: The duration of Entomb is lowered by 1 second, but enemies trapped inside are Silenced and take 45 (+4% per level) damage every 1 second.

20.name: Burning Despair
20.description: Deal 40 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. The damage and area is increased by 100% while Drain Hope is active.

20.name: Death March
20.description: The final swing of March of the Black King also applies Drain Hope to nearby enemy Heroes.

20.name: Shroud of the Dead King
20.description: Activate to become Protected for 3 seconds, preventing all damage.

20.name: Spectral Leech
20.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.5% of the Hero's maximum Health and heal Leoric for twice that amount.
